songs.title: You’re Freaking Me Out
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
So I just finished up my set
And I walked over to the bar
You spilled your drink on my new heels (Moron)
And that's when our fate was sealed
You're such a clumsy creep (What're you looking at?)
Grinning at me

[Chorus]
You're freaking me out
You're freaking me out
What's this all about?
You're freaking me out

[Verse 2]
Oh, God, if you only knew
There must be something wrong with me (I'm so embarrassed)
You're the polar opposite of anything I find attractive
Thoughts of you make me sick (Makes me sick)
Yeah, I kinda like it

[Chorus]
You're freaking me out
You're freaking me out (You're freaking me out)
What's this all about? (What is this all about?)
You're freaking me out
You're freaking me out

[Bridge]
Trippy delusions, romantic intrusions
Consume me, I'm floating down the isle
And you're smiling
Gross!

[Verse 3]
Look at you, look at me
No way I could have seen this coming
Got me thinking crazy things
How can this be happening?
What the hell is wrong with me?
What happened to my sanity?
The whole damn thing is not for me, not with you

[Chorus]
You're freaking me out
You're freaking me out
What's this all about?
You're freaking me out
You are freaking me out
You're freaking me out
You're freaking me out
What's this all about?
You're freaking me out
